name: RoboBlock
description:
RoboBlock is a fast paced game.

You have to change the gravity of the RoboBlock to survive.

Try to get as many orbs as possible.

If you manage to get 100 orbs in on single run then you are really good at this game.

The tutorial only works with the mouse

left mouseclick/ space / left screen side = Change gravity

right mouseclick/Enter/ right screen side = Shoot

Unfortunately, the game lags on mobile browser ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
